sentences.sContent: In the first stage, the trypanosomes multiply in subcutaneous tissues, blood and lymph.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the first stage, the trypanosomes multiply in subcutaneous tissues, blood and lymph.
sentences.sCn: 在第一阶段，锥虫在皮下组织、血液和淋巴中繁殖。

sentences.sContent: This complex system throughout the body makes and transports a protective fluid called lymph.
sentences.sContent_eng: This complex system throughout the body makes and transports a protective fluid called lymph.
sentences.sCn: 遍布人体复杂的淋巴系统能制造和传输淋巴（又称淋巴液）。

trans.tranOther: a clear liquid that is formed in your body and passes into your blood system to fight against infection
